itemizedlist.listitem: -f, --flags — show flags passed to C++ compiler on build
-n, --no-progress — do not print progress to stdout
-r, --no-remote — do not use any remote servers
-t, --threads — specify number of local encoding threads (overriding configuration)
-j, --json <port> — run a JSON server on the specified port
-k, --keep-going — keep running even when the job is complete
-s, --servers <file> — specify servers to use in a text file
-l, --list-servers — just display a list of encoding servers that DCP-o-matic is configured to use; don't encode
-d, --dcp-path — echo DCP's path to stdout on successful completion (implies -n)
--dump — just dump a summary of the film's settings; don't encode
--no-check — don't check project's content files for changes before making the DCP
--export-format <format> — export project to a file, rather than making a DCP: specify mov or mp4
--hints — analyze film for hints before encoding and abort if any are found
